resources.string: We see that you denied us access to look at your music library. :( We can\'t really do anything without access to your music, so we\'re just gonna leave now. Feel free to re-start the app and allow us access if you want to use us again.

Pacer is an app that deals heavily with your music library. We analyze the songs (with your help), and help you decide on a good one to play when exercising. In order to do this, we need to be able to see your music library. Think about letting up do that?
